title: Cinefantastique Vol 08 No 1 (Winter 1978)
creator: Cinefantastique
description: Cover story on The Primevals , David Allen's unfinished stop-motion epic. Also includes interviews with Stephen King, Dan O'Bannon ( Alien ), Jerzy Skolimowski & Jeremy Thomas ( The Shout ), George Romero ( Dawn of the Dead ), Ralph Bakshi ( The Lord of the Rings ), W.D. Richter ( Invasion of the Body Snatchers ), and articles about The Black Cauldron , Piranha , and more.
